thread.title: WIN unlimited rides at the Museum of Science and Industry's Victorian fairground this half term
thread.title_full: WIN unlimited rides at the Museum of Science and Industry's Victorian fairground this half term

author: Emma Gill
title: WIN unlimited rides at the Museum of Science and Industry's Victorian fairground this half term
text:
WIN unlimited rides at the Museum of Science and Industry's Victorian fairground this half term A big wheel, a carousel and swing boats are keeping children busy over the school break Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get What's On updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A Victorian fairground has come to town at the Museum of Science and Industry - and you could win UNLIMITED rides for your kids. 
A carousel, swing boats and a big wheel have descended in the grounds of the museum for February half term . 
The fair is part of the venue's Steam, Sweat and Spinners, a series of interactive shows and workshops led by the museum's Explainer team. 
Families are invited to 'experience the sights, smells and sounds of steam with our thunderous steam engines demonstrations'. 
They can find out about the hard work and sweat which went into working in a mill and get hands on with one of the Goo in the Loo workshops. 
Kids can then join in the Cotton Mill Circus story time, make their very own stories and tales with magic lantern workshops, or strike a pose in the Victorian photo booth. 
There's also chance to ride the 1830 Express, and find out how Manchester changed the world via an exploding balloon and a flying beach ball. 
We're giving away five unlimited ride wristbands to four lucky winners. 
Theyâ€™ll get access to all the Victorian fair rides including the big wheel, carousel, Thomas train ride and boat swings, as well as one ride on the 1830 Express. 
To be in with a chance of winning simply leave your name in the comments under the post on our Manchester Family facebook page here and we'll pick the winners on Wednesday. 
Deadline for entries is 7pm on Wednesday, February 22. 
Entry to the museum is free but there are charges for the train rides and funfair. 
The event runs daily, 10am to 5pm, until Sunday, February 26 . 
For full times and listings, visit msimanchester.org.uk Read More
